wxl 2"115 - 2019 ud¾;= ui 15 jeks isl=rdod - 2019'03'15

II fldgi – wêlrK

iïu; jQ mk;a ... ... ... ... —

Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï ... 210
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
209 - B 081504 — 353 (2019/03)
D 1 -
   msgqj

Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h 
  fuu .eiÜ m;%h www.documents.gov. lk fjí wvúfhka nd.; l< yel' 
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk oekaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs 
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd Èkhka iy fõ,djka 
ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika 
lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a 
ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu 
i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< 
jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr ^tkï" 2019 wfm%a,a ui 05 jeks Èk m<lrk 
.eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2019 ud¾;= ui 22 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr& ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
    2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
   zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m<l< hq;= njg 
hï mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh 
bf,lafg%dksl iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜

ie' hq' -  (i)  fmd,a ixj¾Ok ^ixfYdaOk& mk;a flgqïm; 2019 fmnrjdß ui 15 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ckrcfha

 (ii)  wêlrK ixúOdk ^ixfYdaOk& mk;a flgqïm; 2019 fmnrjdß ui 15 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2019'03'15
210  
lvqfj, ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh
1894 wxl 12 ork fkdjákd f,aLk úkdY lsÍfï wd×mkf;a 5 jeks j.ka;sh m%ldrj lrkq ,nk ksfõokh
fuu wêlrKh bÈßfha kvq lghq;= wjika lr jir 12la .;ù we;s my; Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s kvq jd¾;d 1894 wxl 
12 ork fkdjákd f,aLk úkdY lsÍfï wd{dmkf;a 5 jeks j.ka;sfha úêúOdk m%ldrj fuu ±kaùu m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk 
isg udi ;=kla ^03& bl=;a ùfuka miqj úkdY lrkq ,nk nj fuhska okajd isáñ'
   Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s kvq jd¾;dj, msgm;a fyda fjk;a Bg wod< f,aLk ,nd .ekSug Wkkaÿjla olajk 
;eke;a;ka úiska fuu ±kaùï m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk isg udi ;=kla ^03& bl=;a ùug fmr tA i|yd b,a¨ï l< hq;= njg o 
lsishï kvq jd¾;djla úkdY fkdl, hq;= njg Wkkaÿjla olajk ;eke;a;l= isà kï fuu ±kaùu m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk isg 
udi ;=kla bl=;a ùug fmr ;ud úiskau fyda kS;s{jrhl= u.ska h:d mßÈ bÈßm;a lrkq ,nk fm;aiula u.ska fya;= bÈßm;a 
lsÍug l%shd l< hq;= njg o fuhska ksfõokh lrkq ,efí'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2019'03'15

msial,a úlsŒï
msial,a u.ska lrkq ,nk bvï fjkafoaishla
fmdf<dkakrej Èid wêlrKfha § h
fld<U 02" Y%Su;a Ñ;a;ïm,ï tA .däk¾ udj;" wxl 75 
ork ia:dkfha ,shdmÈxÑ ld¾hd,h iy wr,.xú, YdLd 
ld¾hd,hla msysá uyck nexl=j'
''''''''''''''''''''''''''''meñ‚,slre'
tÈßj
tAlkdhl uqÈhkafia,df.a pdkl Ôjka; nKavdr uhd"
tAlkdhl uqÈhkafia,df.a fikúr;ak nKavdr uhd"
wxl 12" my< we,af,a jej" we,af,ajej'
''''''''''''''''''''''''''''ú;a;slrejka'
j¾I 2019la jQ fmnrjdß ui 20 jeks Èk § h'
fmdf<dkakrej Èid wêlrKfha by; wxl ork kvqfjka fmdf<dkakrej Èid wêlrKfha msial,a fj; ksl=;a lrk ,o 
foam< ;ykug f.k úlsŒfï ßÜ wd×j u; by; ú;a;slrejkaf.ka whlr .; hq;= re' 896"516'79 l uqo,la tlS foam< 
fjkafoais lsÍfï .dia;=j whlr .ekSu i|yd;a tlS msial,a úiska ;ykug f.k we;s my; Wmf,aLkj, úia;r jk 
ÈUq,d., m%dfoaYSh f,alï fldÜGdifha tf.dv m;a;=fõ ÈUq,d., m%dfoaYSh iNd iSudfõ 215 my< we,af,ajej .%du ks,Odß 
fldÜGdifha my< we,af,ajej keu;s .fï i¾fõ ckrd,a úiska iïmdÈ; Tyq Ndrfha we;s w'c'ms'fmd' 250 ^w;s' 01& ys len,s 
wxl 41 ork rcfha bvug udhsïj m%udKfhka fylaghd¾ ìkaÿjhs oYu folhs tlhs ìkaÿjhs ^fyla' 0'210& la jQ bvï 
fldgi" j¾I 2019la jQ ud¾;= ui 28 jeks Èk fm' j' 10'00g tlS foam< msysá ia:dkfha § m%isoaO fjkafoaisfha § úl=Kk 
njg fuhska m%isoaO lrkq ,efí'

yeÍ óg¾ 100la muK bÈßhg jkakg ,smskfha i|yka ksji msysgd we;'
m<uq Wmf,aLkh
   W;=re ueo m<df;a" fmdf<dkakrej Èia;%slalfha ÈUq,d., m%dfoaYSh f,alï fldÜGdifha tf.dv m;a;=fõ ÈUq,d., 
m%dfoaYSh iNd iSudfõ 215 my< we,af,ajej .%du ks,Odß fldÜGdifha my< we,af,ajej keue;s .fï i¾fõh¾ ckrd,a úiska 
iïmdÈ; Tyq Ndrfha we;s w'c'ms'fmd' 250 ^w;s' 01& ys len,s wxl 41 ork rcfha bvug udhsïj"

niakdysrg ( len,s wxl 42'
   hk udhsï ;=< jQ m%udKfhka fylaghd¾ ìkaÿjhs oYu folhs tlhs ìkaÿjhs ^fyla' 0'210& la úYd,;ajhla we;ehs
